title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
/s: After "Guild matters till the end" Minsc + Camp/in party

When talking to Jaheira in Camp at Act 3.

"Please. You're only one of those things", after asking that she has fought the Dead Three before

"My mind is my own", when asking about what she knows about Illithids

Speak to Oyster Boy Dringo and Angry Mar'hyah of the Sword Coast Couriers. Choose 'He lives with me - you can't just take him' when talking about Scratch's ownership. Return to Camp to speak to Scratch. You'll need Speak with
